mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet (petname, age, petgender, pettype, `character`, reg_date, upd_date, order_no, user_id) VALUES (#{petname}, #{age}, #{petgender}, #{pettype}, #{character}, now(), now(), #{orderNo}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM pet p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId}
